hero.subtitle: Manage your business with automated capabilities. Create your online store in minutes with Storely

features.title: All features of modern e-commerce
features.subtitle: Our toolkit covers every aspect of modern e-commerce

features_new.title: Everything you need to grow. All in one place.
features_new.subtitle: Our toolkit covers every aspect of modern e-commerce.

smart_warehouse.title: Smart Warehouse
smart_warehouse.desc: Real-time stock tracking. Automatic low stock notifications.

sync.title: Auto-Sync
sync.desc: Stock changes are instantly reflected in the storefront. No delays.

analytics_v2.title: Instant Analytics
analytics_v2.desc: All metrics in one place. Monitor total revenue, customer count, and order statistics in real-time.

telegram.title: Telegram Web App Integration
telegram.desc: Your store is now inside Telegram. Customers open your store via a special button in the bot menu. No external links — full Web App capabilities.

orders_v2.title: Order Lifecycle
orders_v2.desc: Smart order management. Control every order status — from receipt to delivery into the customer's hands.

catalog.title: Catalog and Limits
catalog.desc: Product and category management. Control stock levels and create your own brand. Add products based on your subscription plan.

settings.title: Settings and Logistics
settings.desc: Logistics and branding. Configure delivery zones, upload banners, and tailor your store to your style.

step1.title: Create Account
step1.desc: Register in 30 seconds. No credit card required.

step2.title: Upload Products
step2.desc: Import via Excel or add manually. Upload photos.

step3.title: Start Selling
step3.desc: Publish your store and accept first orders instantly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Storely platform

q1.q: How fast can I launch my store?
q1.a: You can launch a fully functional store in less than 30 seconds. Just register, add products, and connect your Telegram bot.

q2.a: Absolutely not. Our interface is intuitive, and Telegram integration happens in a few clicks.

q3.a: We support Payme, Click, and cash on delivery. You can configure them in your admin panel.

q4.q: Is there a free trial period?
q4.a: Yes, we offer a trial period for new users to test all the features of the platform.

footer.desc: Operating system for modern commerce. We build tools that help entrepreneurs grow faster.
footer.rights: © 2026 Storely Technologies Inc. All rights reserved.

hero.title: The most powerful tools for your business
hero.subtitle: All the features you need to manage sales and automate your business in one toolkit.

catalog.title: Smart Catalog
catalog.desc: Easily manage products and categories. Variations, stock control, and multi-level structure.

orders.title: Order Management
orders.desc: Track every order through statuses. Easy communication with customers and order history.

analytics.title: Deep Analytics
analytics.desc: Get a complete picture of your sales, customers, and most popular products.

marketing.title: Marketing Tools
marketing.desc: Attract customers with discounts, promo codes, and banners to increase sales.

inventory.title: Inventory System
inventory.desc: Monitor stock levels in real-time. Receive notifications about low stock.

teams.title: Team Collaboration
teams.desc: Assign roles to employees and control access to important data.

telegram.title: Telegram Web App — Future of Commerce
telegram.subtitle: Your store is now inside Telegram. Customers buy without leaving the messenger.

1.title: Instant Entry
1.desc: Store opens in a second via the bot menu button.

2.title: Native UI
2.desc: An interface that feels like a native mobile app.

3.desc: Notify customers about order status instantly.

hero.title: All your favorite services in one place

payments.title: Payment Systems

marketing.title: Marketing & Analytics
marketing.subtitle: Analyze traffic and increase the number of customers.

hero.title: Perfect design for every business
hero.subtitle: Use ready-made templates from our experts and launch your store in minutes.

hero.title: Our Development Path
hero.subtitle: From a small startup to a modern ecosystem. We work every day to improve the platform.

privacy.intro_text: We take your privacy seriously. This document describes what data we collect and how we use it.
privacy.data_collection_text: We only collect data necessary for the platform to function:
data_items: Technical information about browser and device
privacy.data_usage_text: Your data is used to process orders, improve our service, and communicate with you about your account.
privacy.data_protection_text: We use modern encryption methods and secure servers to protect your information.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access your data, correct it, or request deletion.

terms.acceptance_text: By using Storely, you agree to these terms of use in full.
terms.registration_text: When registering, you agree to provide accurate information.
terms.responsibilities_text: Users are responsible for the security of their passwords and any actions taken under their account.
terms.intellectual_property_text: All materials posted on the platform are protected by copyright law.
terms.termination_text: We reserve the right to suspend account access in case of violation of these rules.

cookie.what_are_cookies_text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website.
cookie.how_we_use_cookies_text: We use cookies to save your preferences, remember items in your cart, and for analytics.
cookie.types_of_cookies_text: We use necessary (for site operation) and analytical cookies.
cookie.managing_cookies_text: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect some site features.
